page.title: 18TRADE Pentney & Narboro'
page.content:
A varied selection of businesses exist in Narborough and Pentney. There are several shops in Narborough but none in Pentney.
A renovated Maltings at Narborough accomodates various enterprises, eg. Motor spares, Furniture shop and Wrought iron works.
Narborough boasts three{General {Stores,}an{Electrical Shop,}a{Dairy,}a {Garage,}a{Greengrocers}and a{Trout {Farm Shop.}Both villages have an{Inn providing meals and overnight accomodation.
In Pentney various businesses include: {Catering, Funeral Directors,}a{Coal {Merchant,}and a{Farm Machinery Firm. {Sand and gravel}are excavated close by.
